messages.title: Lib Dem tax cut for local people
messages.content: Local people would get a £700 tax cut under the plans of Vince Cable MP who is backing Chris Nicholson as your next MP.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promising a £700 tax cut for local people with the support of Vince Cable MP.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Chris Nicholson is the main challenger to Labour, implying tactical voting might be a consideration.

contactInformation.address: Chris Nicholson’s Lib Dems FREEPOST SE8431 LONDON SE11 4BR

endorsements.endorsement: Supports Chris Nicholson's plans for a £700 local tax cut.

images.caption: Chris Nicholson holding a '£700' sign with supporters.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet includes a bar chart suggesting that Chris Nicholson is the main challenger to Labour, and strategic voting could be an element to consider. The precise constituency is not mentioned in the visible leaflet, and incomplete information is available due to limited images and text visibility.
